name: Direcat
description:
Submission for ScoreSpace Jam #10. Theme: Direction

Content: Be part of the detective work of a cat catching a mouse. Direct your dire cat through the mouse maze.

Controls: left click the tile you want to go to.

Idea, sound and art: qualkappe
Programming: dunkelgrau
Music: Kevin MacLeod - George Street Shuffle (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
